issue.title: [CF 402] Weapon Enchant Icon doesn't properly update
issue.body:
I've noticed while twinking rogue and shaman, where I use Tmw to alert me to reapply poisons or earthliving weapon, that Tmw does not immediately update when I use those abilities. I have to un- and reequip them, or enchant them a second time to get the icon to update. A minor annoyance, but still.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #402 | Raw

comments.body:
Yeah, Weapon Enchant Icon have some problem in zhCN & zhTW client too.
Beacuse in zhTW client that name show on tooltip is same as spell name,  the suggestions list will miss that WEAPON word, like 'earthliving weapon' it's show on tootip is "大地生命武器", but suggestions list show that name is '大地生命' (earthliving), don't have word 'weapon'. this error is zhTW client ONLY.

In zhCN client, if you type or select weapon enchant name to editbox, icon couldn't work, i think that parentheses are double byte charactor '（）' on that weapon tooltip make this happened.

Sorry for my bad english! :D

Edited Dec 29, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

The suggestion list for weapon enchants uses hacks that should never be spoken of. It basically tries really hard to guess at what the name on the tooltip should be based on the name of the spell that applies it.

The problem with zhTW clients is that you must have mistakenly translated SUG_MATCH_WPNENCH_ENCH - I removed "武器" from it just now, so it should be working correctly in the next revision.

I will look into the multibyte parenthesis detection - I was never able to test zhCN on the ptr because my client crashed every time I attempted to log in with zhCH as the current locale.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

384 should have fixed both of your bugs, lsjyzjl. AmeroGer, I will look into your issue. Could you post the export string of the icons that you have setup to track your weapon enchants?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

zhTW clients is ok now, sorry for that mistake. -.-
zhCN WoW clients are looks like that WoW in mars, special versions, special models, special update time, ALL SPECIALS, so this why you using zhCN client test on prt will crashed.

I will test on zhCN client tomorrow night.

Edited Dec 29, 2011
